monster.name: Giant Lizard

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Variant: Giant Lizard Traits
action.text: Some giant lizards have one or both of the following traits:
Hold Breath. The lizard can hold its breath for 15 minutes. (A lizard that has this trait also has a swimming speed of 30 feet.)
Spider Climb. The lizard can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

monster.description: A giant lizard can be ridden or used as a draft animal. Lizardfolk also keep them as pets, and subterranean giant lizards are used as mounts and pack animals by drow, duergar, and other Underdark dwellers.Variant: Giant Lizard TraitsSome giant lizards have one or both of the following traits.
